text:
COPY
February 10, 1958
Mr. Jack McBride
Director of Television
Station KUON-TV
University of Nebraska
Lincoln a, Nebraska
Dear Jack:
I regret to inform you that it was not possible for the Grants-
in-Aid Sub-Committee of the NAEB Research Committee to approve
your application of December 27, 1957 for a grant-in-aid.
We wish there had been adequate funds to support all applications,
for your application did offer considerable promise. V/e hope you
may still be able to carry it on, in whole or in part, on funds
from your own or other sources.
Meanwhile, may toe thank you for your application and wish you
every success.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Shorn ia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc
CC: Kenneth Harwoo
Sam Becker ^
Irving Merrill
Hideya Kumata
Raymond Cheydleur
Burton Paulu
Blind CC: I. Keith Tyler
